remarks: The constant functor of ` X ` is a functor.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jan-2017.)
statement:
diagval.l $e |- L = ( C DiagFunc D ) $.
diagval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
diagval.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. Cat ) $.
diag11.a $e |- A = ( Base ` C ) $.
diag11.c $e |- ( ph -> X e. A ) $.
diag11.k $e |- K = ( ( 1st ` L ) ` X ) $.
diag1cl $p |- ( ph -> K e. ( D Func C ) ) $.
